title: Illinois DUI: License Suspension Basics
summary: Plain-English overview of license-related consequences and why timing matters.

faqs.q: Is license suspension automatic after a DUI arrest?
faqs.a: It depends on the situation and the administrative process. Timing matters; consult counsel early.

title: What to Do After a Car Accident in Illinois
summary: A practical checklist to protect your health, evidence, and claim.

faqs.q: What should I do first after a crash?
faqs.a: Get medical help if needed, call police, document the scene, and avoid recorded statements until you understand your options.
